model_name.description: Name of the AI model being profiled.

model_provider.description: Organization or entity that developed the model.

model_version.description: Specific version identifier of the model, if available.

mipp_version.description: Version of the MIPP benchmark used for testing.

test_date.description: Date when the benchmark testing was conducted.

verified_profile.description: Indicates if the profile data has been verified by the model provider or a trusted third party.

ideological_coordinates.description: Model's positioning on various ideological axes.

performance_metrics.description: Quantitative scores on various performance aspects.

personality_profile.description: Qualitative and quantitative aspects of the model's derived personality.

humor_style_classification.description: Primary humor style identified (e.g., Analytical-Dry, Wordplay-Puns).

key_characteristics_tags.description: Short descriptive tags for notable traits (e.g., 'Acknowledges uncertainty', 'Avoids controversy').

module_scores.description: Overall scores for each main module of the MIPP benchmark.

composite_scores.description: High-level composite scores derived from multiple metrics.

raw_responses_link.description: Path or URI reference to the detailed raw responses file for this model.

profile_summary.description: A brief narrative summary of the model's key findings from the MIPP benchmark.

last_updated.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when this profile was last generated or updated.
